# ion-note

A note is detailed item in an ion-item. It creates greyed out element that can be on
the left or right side of an item.

```html
<ion-content>
  <ion-list>
    <ion-item>
      <ion-note slot="start">
        Left Note
      </ion-note>
      My Item
      <ion-note slot="end">
        Right Note
      </ion-note>
    </ion-item>
  </ion-list>
</ion-content>
```

string


#### mode

any
